title: Claim Update
message: Your prescription refill claim CLM-2024-003 was reviewed. Additional documents required within 3 days.

title: Benefit Reminder
message: Annual dental check-up benefit expires on 30 Nov. Schedule an appointment to use the remaining coverage.

title: Coverage Threshold
message: Your medical coverage is 80% utilized. Review remaining balance before booking new treatments.

title: Policy Renewed
message: Employer health policy renewed for 2026. View updated coverage limits and co-pay rules.
